[[File:Monster Food Add-On key art.jpeg|thumb|300px|Key art for the add-on]]
'''Monster Food''' is an add-on developed by ''Noxcrew'' as part of the [[Beyond the Pale Garden]] event, centered around food made from monster parts.

* [[File:Guide Addon MFA.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Guide Add-On

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Are you bored of carrots and steaks? Monster Food is here to help! Turn scary into succulent as you chop and cook all hostile mobs!

Monster Food adds items and recipes to cook brand new meals. Use a crockpot to combine ingredients into monstrous dishes! Plate the meals to decorate your home, or eat them and gain special powers... and curses.|Minecraft Marketplace description}}

== Trivia ==
* [[Hoglin meat]] was previously an unused item found in the code of {{BE}}, presumably deemed redundant in favor of [[porkchops]].
* The item green ham and eggs is a reference to the children's book ''{{Wikipedia|Green Eggs and Ham}}'', reordered presumably due to copyright concerns.
** Coincidentally, a map featuring works of [[Dr. Suess]] was previously produced.
